title: Don't let this one get away! 1 BR, 1 BA. Prime Stone Mountain location
map_address: 6097 Memorial Dr near South Hairston Road
posting_body: ['Wildwood At Stone Mountain', 'Leasing Office:', '6097 Memorial Dr', 'Stone Mountain, GA 30083', 'show contact info', 'Take a look at what Wildwood At Stone Mountain has to offer!', 'Welcome to Wildwood at Stone Mountain Apartment Homes, a hidden treasure in the shadow of Stone Mountain.', 'Make yourself at home in your choice of spacious one, two and three bedroom apartment homes.', 'Relax on your private patio or balcony.', 'Take care of business through your personal high-speed internet connection.', 'Enjoy an array of amenities including a sparkling pool, fitness gym and Resident Business Center, all in the natural setting only 2 miles from Stone Mountain Park.', 'Please call for an appointment today.', 'Rental Information:', '1 Bedroom / 1 Bathroom / 816 sq ft / $1180/Month', 'Lease Terms:', '6-Month, 12-Month', 'Apartment Amenities:', '● Air Conditioning', '● Cable Ready', '● Carpet', '● Dishwasher', '● Garbage Disposal', '● Handicap Accessible', '● Heating', '● High Speed Internet Access', '● Patio or Balcony', '● Range', '● Alarm Systems in Select Apartments', '● All Appliances are Electric', '● Walk-in Closets in Select Apartments', '● Washers and Dryers Provided in Most Apartments', '● Water Based on Usage', '● White on White Kitchens', 'Additional Information:', '● Business Center', '● Fitness Center', '● Freeway Access', '● Gated', '● Onsite Maintenance', '● Onsite Management', '● Playground', '● Pool', '● Public Transportation', '● Shopping Nearby', '● 2 Miles from Stone Mountain Park', '● Controlled Access Entry Gates', '● Georgia Perimeter College Minutes Away', '● Marta Bus Stop at Community Entry', '● Professionally Landscaped', '● Sparkling Pool with Fountains', '● Walking Distance to Shopping and Dining', 'Leasing Hours:', 'Mon - Fri: 8:30 AM - 5:30 PM', 'No specials at this time.', 'Pet Policy:', 'Breed Restriction;Weight Restriction;Pet friendly.', 'No pets over 10 pounds and no aggressive breeds.', ' $300 pet fee, $500 for two pets and $35 per pet each month.', 'Website:', '<URL>/', 'Management Company:', 'Peak Living', 'EQUAL HOUSING OPPORTUNITY', 'B131CFE1BD30410']
